Table.sql: select c.mabn,c.hoten,case when substr(b.tuoivao,4)='0' then substr(b.tuoivao,1,3)||' (Tu)' else case when substr(b.tuoivao,4)='1' then substr(b.tuoivao,1,3)||' (Th)' else case when b.maphuongxa=f.maphuongxa where a.maql>0

Table.cont: (a.maicd like 'A00%' or a.maicd like 'A01%' or a.maicd like 'A03%' or a.maicd like 'A06%' or a.maicd like 'A09%' or a.maicd like 'A83%' or a.maicd like 'A84%' or a.maicd like 'A85%' or a.maicd like 'A86%' or a.maicd like 'A87%' or a.maicd like 'A88%' or a.maicd like 'A89%' or a.maicd like 'A90%' or a.maicd like 'A91%' or a.maicd like 'B15%' or a.maicd like 'B16%' or a.maicd like 'B17%' or a.maicd like 'B18%' or a.maicd like 'B19%' or a.maicd like 'A82%' or a.maicd like 'A39.0%' or a.maicd like 'B01%' or a.maicd like 'B02%' or a.maicd like 'A36%' or a.maicd like 'A37%' or a.maicd like 'A33%' or a.maicd like 'A35%' or a.maicd like 'A80%' or a.maicd like 'B05%' or a.maicd like 'B26%' or a.maicd like 'J10%' or a.maicd like 'J11%' or a.maicd like 'B30%' or a.maicd like 'A20%' or a.maicd like 'A22%' or a.maicd like 'A27%' or a.maicd like 'B20%' or a.maicd like 'B21%' or a.maicd like 'B22%' or a.maicd like 'B23%' or a.maicd like 'B24%' or a.maicd like 'B50%' or a.maicd like 'B51%' or a.maicd like 'B52%' or a.maicd like 'B53%' or a.maicd like 'B54%')
Table.stt: case when a.maicd like 'A00%' then '01' else case when a.maicd like 'A01%' then '02' else case when a.maicd like 'A03%' then '03' else case when a.maicd like 'A06%' then '04' else case when a.maicd like 'A09%' then '06' else case when a.maicd like 'A83%' or a.maicd like 'A84%' or a.maicd like 'A85%' or a.maicd like 'A86%' or a.maicd like 'A87%' or a.maicd like 'A88%' or a.maicd like 'A89%' then '07' else case when a.maicd like 'A90%' or a.maicd like 'A91%' then '08' else case when a.maicd like 'B15%' or a.maicd like 'B16%' or a.maicd like 'B17%' or a.maicd like 'B18%' or a.maicd like 'B19%' then '09' else case when a.maicd like 'A82%' then '10' else case when a.maicd like 'A39.0%' then '11' else case when a.maicd like 'B01%' or a.maicd like 'B02%' then '12' else case when a.maicd like 'A36%' then '13' else case when a.maicd like 'A37%' then '14' else case when a.maicd like 'A33%' then '15' else case when a.maicd like 'A35%' then '16' else case when a.maicd like 'A80%' then '17' else case when a.maicd like 'B05%' then '18' else case when a.maicd like 'B26%' then '19' else case when a.maicd like 'J10%' or a.maicd like 'J11%' then '20' else case when a.maicd like 'B30%' then '21' else case when a.maicd like 'A20%' then '22' else case when a.maicd like 'A22%' then '23' else case when a.maicd like 'A27%' then '24' else case when a.maicd like 'B20%' or a.maicd like 'B21%' or a.maicd like 'B22%' or a.maicd like 'B23%' or a.maicd like 'B24%' then '25' else case when a.maicd like 'B50%' or a.maicd like 'B51%' or a.maicd like 'B52%' or a.maicd like 'B53%' or a.maicd like 'B54%' then '26' else '27' end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end end
